1.0.name: wordpress/fw-subpageinadiv-spiad
1.0.description: Displays the content of a subpage named "spiad" in a div element for specific pages. For example, you may have a special area in your sidebar with a default content. If you want to display something else in this area for specific pages, just create a subpage called spiad and its content will be displayed in the div area instead of default one.
